<script>
(function() {
  function updateHarmonogramStatus() {
    const table = document.getElementById('harmonogram-table');
    if (!table) return;

    const today = new Date();
    today.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0);
    const rows = table.querySelectorAll('tbody tr');
    let nextClassFound = false;

    rows.forEach(row => {
      const dateStr = row.getAttribute('data-date');
      if (!dateStr) return;

      // Parse date (format: '02-03.10.2025' or '06.10.2025')
      let classDate;
      try {
        if (dateStr.includes('-') && dateStr.includes('.')) {
          // Range like '02-03.10.2025'
          const parts = dateStr.split('.');
          const dayPart = parts[0].split('-')[1] || parts[0].split('-')[0];
          classDate = new Date(parts[2], parts[1] - 1, dayPart);
        } else {
          // Single date like '06.10.2025'
          const parts = dateStr.split('.');
          classDate = new Date(parts[2], parts[1] - 1, parts[0]);
        }

        const statusCell = row.querySelector('.status-cell');
        if (classDate < today) {
          statusCell.textContent = 'âœ…';
        } else if (!nextClassFound) {
          statusCell.textContent = 'â–¶ï¸';
          nextClassFound = true;
        } else {
          statusCell.textContent = '';
        }
      } catch (e) {
        console.error('Error parsing date:', dateStr, e);
      }
    });
  }

  // Run on page load
  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', updateHarmonogramStatus);
  } else {
    updateHarmonogramStatus();
  }
})();
</script>
